feature.label: Logback Beagle Feature
feature.description: During the development process, it is common for developers to print log output on the console. Typically, the developer will also customize the format of the log output by setting properties of a PatternLayout instance. Logback Beagle serves the same purpose as the regular console, but offers several advantages over the plain-old console. Here is a list of key advantages of our plugin: - coloring of events - easy jump to caller - flexible output format - filter-out events by setting the level of existing loggers - easy configuration
